properties.name: Capo Caccia
properties.description: Posted by SaraccoWonderful place, great seaside and there is a beautiful forest of pine trees. Watch out. It is not located where it is shown on the map but on the opposite side of Sardinia. I do not know how to move the location pin- somebody can help me out?

properties.name: Honeymooning, July 2006
properties.description: Posted by SaraccoA great beach. They tell you you can get there only by boat but it is not true. It is just 30 minutes walk from Los Cabo downtown. You walk through the Finisterrra hotel, stroll on the beach and climb (easy) the rocks at the end of the beach and there you are...

properties.name: My Wedding Place
properties.description: Posted by SaraccoThe castle foundation goes back to the XII-XIII century. Later, it was home to Camillo Benso Conte di Cavour, the first Italian Prime Minister, back in the 1852. On July 6th,2006 I got married here!

properties.description: Posted by SaraccopisaThis is the most beautiful square, in my opinion, in Pisa with a lot of history and the best Math Faculty in Italy
